The researcher, Al -Shawiya, in his words, is up to the Almighty: We have replied in it in love, so the incision in the meaning mentioned is not arranged between it and between the rain in origin and between it and between it and between it, and between it and between it and between it.For what is meant by the women, what you have reported from the earth until the growth is bound and the love is complicated; The inhalation of the land with the bullets is still increasing and expanding that arrangement on the fact that the generous arrangement of the excessive blessings from the side of the one who is excessive of the sides of it The customs are as well as the analogy of the two doctrines with the two source, so the act of the one who is blessed with it in the arrival of that is the one who is in the authority A domain, and it was also said to him: The incision in the Lord does not appear in grapes, Zayton, and palm trees, and it is answered that it is not from the boundaries of the kind The one who is given to him and is to be able to be the remembrance of the goddess in the gossip on the way of the representative What is meant by the water of the rain is the rain of the rain, and this is the procedure of the rivers, and it is followed by the fact that it is the arrangement of the incision on the casting of the water in the word of the crime, and also the path of the ritual In the meaningful sense, it is not permitted by the Almighty saying: and we have descended from the hunger water, so we can bring out the love of the verse; To make it sense to take up the casting and remove the absurdity in that, and drive that the water of the eyes is from the rain, not from the carrier, which is in the land and does not hide from this eye that this is the same Covering, and what is meant by love is the sweetener of the love that I have been burdened with and savings like a bowl, barley and atom and others.
